description: Unique identifier for the statement or transaction.
The account number associated with the transaction.
The branch code or identifier where the transaction occurred.
Unique identifier for the customer initiating the transaction.
Code representing the type of transaction (e.g., withdrawal, deposit).
Reference number for the transaction for tracking purposes.
Description or remarks for the transaction.
Date on which the transaction occurred.
Date when the transaction value is applied to the account.
Currency code of the transaction (e.g., USD, EUR).
Transaction amount in the original currency.
Transaction amount converted to the local currency.
Exchange rate applied to convert the transaction amount.
Internal reference number for the transaction.
System-generated identifier for the transaction.
Indicator of whether the transaction required an override (e.g., limit breach).
User who initiated or entered the transaction.
Date and time when the transaction was initiated.
User who authorized or approved the transaction.
Date and time when the transaction was authorized.
Branch code of the user who initiated or authorized the transaction.
